entry.title: Axis Crop Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 95.00

This loose fitting sports tank designed as a layering style for wear in and out of the gym. A new take on the classic tank, this style features twisted boxing wrap-inspired panels and mesh to subtly highlight your sports bra, while also providing ventilation. Reflective triangles are placed at the back for visibility.

Main: 73% Polyamide 27% Elastane, Mesh: 80% Polyamide 20% Elastane

entry.title: Axis Crop Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 95.00

Loose fitting sports tank designed as a layering style for wear in and out of the gym. A new take on the classic black tank, this style features twisted boxing wrap-inspired panels and mesh to subtly highlight your sports bra, while also providing ventilation. Reflective triangles are placed at the back for visibility.

Main: 73% Polyamide 27% Elastane, Mesh: 80% Polyamide 20% Elastane

entry.title: Technical Knit Sleeveless Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 65.00

Update your workout basics with the super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh circular knit, sustainable sleeveless t-shirt. Built with second skin Qnova polyamide, this classic sleeveless t-shirt is lightweight, breathable and has excellent moisture control. A foundational piece for any workout wardrobe. Made from 100% Qnova Polyamide - more than 50% recycled materials, and produced with lower emissions and reduced water consumption.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size XS/S

entry.title: Performance Cross Back Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 35.00

This lightweight, fitted tank is a must-have for any wardrobe. The fine, moisture-wicking fabric, internal support at the chest and mesh insert at the small of the back ensure comfort when working out, while the slim fit, dipped hem, delicate straps and loop over cross back make it eminently wearable for any occasion. Made from 72% Polyamide 28% Elastane.

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Hybrid Crop Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 70.00

Our loose-fit Hybrid Crop Tank is ideal for on-the-go or layering at the gym. With florescent neckline detailing, it is crafted from lightweight, quick dry and moisture wicking fabric in 73% Polyamide, 27% Elastane.

Model is 5'11, bust 32" and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Knit Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 25.00

Our Technical Knit Tank is a must-have for any active wardrobe. The seamless moisture-wicking fabric features ventilation panels along the sides, front and back to ensure comfort when working out. The integrated bra support is ideal for floor-based exercises and other low intensity workouts. Made from 94% Polyamide 6% Elastane.

entry.title: Kubrick T-Shirt Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 80.00

Now available in black, the new T-shirt shape in soft touch fabric and designed for a loose, full coverage fit. The Kubrick T-shirt's lightweight feel creates a delicate drape that flatters the body. At the back, Technical taping frames the breathable mesh paneling. A great layering piece.

Made from 93% Lyocell 7% Elastane.

Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 25.00 - 55.00 (4 variants)

Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 80.00

Update your workout staples with the premium comfort of this slim-fit white t-shirt in a moisture-wicking Italian fabric. Features a v-neckline and signature reflective triangles at the back with gold reflective logo at the front chest and back neck. Made from 73% Polyamide 27% Elastane

entry.title: Technical Knit Long Sleeve Top
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 60.00

Update your workout basics with the super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh circular knit, round neck layering long sleeve top. Without any side seams, it fits like a second skin so is perfect for all types of workouts. Fully breathable moisture wicking with pinhole panels at the waist and under the arms. Made from 100% Polyamide.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small
